content: Our net asset value per share reached its highest level since CCAP's inception, ending the quarter at $21.18, representing approximately 5% year-over-year growth. We ended the quarter with our largest portfolio since inception, with nearly $1.3 billion of investments at fair value across 130 portfolio companies with an average investment size of less than 1% of the total portfolio. On March 31st, our stockholder’s equity was $654 million, resulting in a net -- record net asset value per share of $21.18, as compared to $652 million or $21.12 per share last quarter. Despite a lower deployment backdrop for the first quarter, as Jason discussed, our total investment portfolio at fair value of $1.3 billion as of March 31, 2022. with the largest it's ever been, and represents a 21.8% year-over-year increase.
